page.title: 0922nd June Local Fayre & News
page.content: Matthew, Alex, Russell and Stephen held a stall called Jack Box. They had a board with matchboxes on and inside were pieces of paper giving the prizes. They made Â£4.00. There were three displays in the hall, Country Dancing, Keep Fit and Gymnastics, they were a great success. {The Princess of Wales}arrived in Crowthorne by helicopter to visit {Ravenswood Village School on June 25th 1985, to meet the Handicapped residents and see them learning everyday skills. Another major event in the area was {Sandhurst's Half Marathon,}this was the biggest half marathon ever held in the area. 1500 people took part in the 13 mile running race. The course was around Owlsmoor, Little Sandhurst and Finchampstead. It was a lovely sunny day.
